27526.summary: Some customers in the Centennial area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
27526.title: Oct 18 – Winnipeg (Centennial) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
